pages.text: End spells can be found in End Cities or Stronghold Libraries

pages.title: Darkball
pages.text: Shoots an Ender Dragon fireball that creates a deadly damage zone upon impact. $(li)Mana Cost: 10

pages.title: Swap
pages.text: Allows the user to swap places with the target $(li)Mana Cost: 40 $(li)Range: 20

pages.title: Ender
pages.text: Instantly opens the user's ender chest inventory $(li)Mana Cost: 20
